title: John Deere | Full Stack Developer
content:
Education: B.Tech ECE | Non CS/IT
Years of Experience: 1.9
Current Company : Accenture
Current Componsation : 4.2 Lakh Per Annum
Company: John Deere | On Pay Roll of PruTech Solutions
Title/Level: Full Stack Developer
Location: Pune.
Base Salary: 10.5 LPA
Stock bonus: NA
Benefits: One Way Flight Ticket, 14 Days Accomodation, Family Health Insurance.
Annual Bonus: Not Mentioned
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 11LPA

On a Third Party Pay roll for John Deere is it worth?

title: ServiceNow IC2
content:
Education: Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 2 yrs
Prior Experience: Startup
Prior Compensation: 17LPA
Company: ServiceNow
Title/Level: Software Engineer(IC2)
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: Rs.22,00,000
relocation: 20,000 + Air Tickets + Hotel Stay for 15 days
Joining Bonus: NA
Stock Bonus: $35000(4year vesting schedule)
Performance Bonus: 10% of base
1st Year Salary: 22 + 10 = ~30LPA
Other Benefits: Standard Servicenow benefits.
